dublin_core.dcvalue: Dr. Alain B. Labrique, Associate Professor, Johns Hopkins University, Email: alabriqu@gmail.com
Two Unions (Kuptala and Konchibari) of the Gaibandha District, Bangladesh

The mTikka system is a virtual vaccination registry and immunization performance tracking system designed to reduce barriers to timely vaccination of infants in rural Bangladesh that optimizes recordkeeping, manages workflows, and connects families to routine immunization services.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:19:21Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 mtikka.pdf: 196183 bytes, checksum: bb5c9c0d42eb5e198bd816978f848351 (MD5)
Client education and behavior change communication, Data collection and reporting, Electronic health records, Provider work planning and scheduling, Infectious diseases
